item.title: Useful Online LaTeX and Markdown Editors
item.description: LaTeX ShareLaTeX which is integrated with Overleaf now. Online LaTeX editors and best for working individully or collaboratively online. TeXLive + Visual Studio Code + LaTeX Workshop. Very productive combination for writing LaTeX. Markdown StackEdit Online Markdown editor and good for writing simple documents and converting them into different format. Typora Very impressive offline Markdown WYSIWYG editor. Very powerful in converting markdown to other formats.
